com.gensym.jgi.dataservice
Interface DataServiceListener

public interface DataServiceListener
extends EventListener

The DataServiceListener will be called with the following events:

  • setData, when a SET action is performed on the G2 variable.
  • getData, when G2 requires a new value for the G2 variable.
  • variableRegistration, when G2 first sends a reference for the variable to JavaLink (before the first getData or setData).
  • variableDeregistration, when a previously registered variable is deleted, or disabled.

    Method Summary
     void getData(DataServiceEvent e)
              getData is called by G2 when it requires a new value from the external system for a Gsi Variable.
     void setData(DataServiceEvent e)
              setData is called by G2 when a value has been set on a Gsi Variable using the SET action.
     void variableDeregistration(DataServiceEvent e)
              variableDeregistration is called by G2 when a variable (previously registered on a DataService) is no longer available (disabled, deleted, or G2 reset/restarted).
     void variableRegistration(DataServiceEvent e)
              variableRegistration is called when a Variable in G2 requires servicing from a DataService.
     

    Method Detail

    setData

    public void setData(DataServiceEvent e)
    setData is called by G2 when a value has been set on a Gsi Variable using the SET action.
    Parameters:
    e - A DataServiceEvent detailing the event e.getDataItem() will contain the GsiDataService variable that caused the event e.getValue() will contain the value set by the SET action.

    getData

    public void getData(DataServiceEvent e)
    getData is called by G2 when it requires a new value from the external system for a Gsi Variable.
    Parameters:
    e - A DataServiceEvent detailing the event e.getDataItem() will contain the GsiDataService variable that caused the event

    variableRegistration

    public void variableRegistration(DataServiceEvent e)
    variableRegistration is called when a Variable in G2 requires servicing from a DataService.
    Parameters:
    e - A DataServiceEvent detailing the event e.getDataItem() will contain the GsiDataService variable that caused the event e.getIdentifingAttributes() returns the identifing attributes values for this registration

    variableDeregistration

    public void variableDeregistration(DataServiceEvent e)
    variableDeregistration is called by G2 when a variable (previously registered on a DataService) is no longer available (disabled, deleted, or G2 reset/restarted).
    Parameters:
    e - A DataServiceEvent detailing the event e.getDataItem() will contain the GsiDataService variable that caused the event
